casebody.data:
No. 16. Salvá v. Estate of Borrás et al. Motion for the admission of an appeal from a decision of the Supreme Court of Porto Eico to the Supreme Court of the United States. Decided April 18, 1905. Messrs. López Landrón and Pettingill, for petioners; Messrs. José Guzmán Benitez, Hartzell and Rodriguez Serra, for adverse party.

The motion was denied.
